full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**:
SBIPS TGMS (Solution Based Informatics Professional Services)

**Reference Number**:
PW-22-01011397

**Publication Date**:
October 25, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**:
December 19, 2022, 14:00:00

**Amendment Number**:
6 (updated December 14, 2022)

**Procurement Category**:
SRV (Services)

**Procurement Method**:
Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Notice Type**:
Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements**:
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement

**Region of Opportunity**:
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**:
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

**Point of Contact**:
Michael Beaudoin
Phone: 613-859-0841
Email: [michael.beaudoin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.beaudoin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**:
The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC), along with the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) and the Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR), require configuration accelerators, maintenance, and support services, as well as system integration services to transition from multiple legacy grants management systems to a unified cloud solution on Microsoft Dynamics 365 Power Platform.

**Security Requirements**:
SRCL: Common PS SRCL #06
Minimum Corporate Security Required: Protected B
Resource Minimum Security Level Required: RELIABILITY

**Contract Period**:
The proposed contract will be for three years, with two one-year irrevocable options, allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Attachments**:
[Download the tender documents from Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/9f0ca6b66d02c303f596f1d81d4880a2/tgms_rfp_final_v2.pdf)

Note: This tender announcement includes attachments, but they are not displayed here. Please visit the official Canada Buys website to access
